entry.title: To Live or Let Live (EDITING)
entry.summary:
Author: RuinWanders

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,284Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 2,924

Summary: When visiting Gotham city on a class field trip, Marinette has had enough. Enough of Adrien's obsessive behavior even though she no longer loves him. Enough of Lila's constant lies. Enough of being alone.When she decides to stay with her godfather Alfred Pennyworth, Damian Wayne was not in her plans. And she is more than he knows how to handle.

entry.title: I Got Isekai’d Into Miraculous—Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I’m a Robin. I’ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,527Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story.A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim.To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course!And He has a task to fulfill, a mission to accomplish: prevent the Love-Square from forming. Be the home-wrecker and steal Marinette from Adrien.Is he going to do it? For the sake of the mission? We'll see.

entry.title: Corporate Jargon
entry.summary:
Author: ggomoz (ggomo_springtime)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,780Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 249

Summary: It was the most peculiar thing to see Daniel Fenton and Marinette Dupain-Cheng vehemently turn down a project. There was disgust. Barely concealed loathing. What was so strange about their bosses’ offer? They were about to be given a chance to redesign the suits of Justice League members and renovate part of the Watchtower.On a completely unrelated note, an incident with the Order and the use of ectoplasm forces the Celestial Guardian and the King of the Infinite Realms to finally meet.

entry.title: Love Language: Gift Giving
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,676Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 1,439

Summary: Marinette has taken to social media with her designs and ideas. Unfortunately, (or fortunately, depending on how you see it) one of her viewers has made it to where she has to be *very* careful with her words. A single mention of something she's debating on getting or that she needs to get something and boom, someone sends her a gift. They never attach a name or any identification. Marinette doesn't know who they are, but they won't. stop. sending. her. gifts.Honestly, she's getting worried about them and their bad spending habits.

entry.title: New Year's
entry.summary:
Author: willow_exe

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,228Chapters: 5/7Kudos: 220

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng always liked New Year's. Particularly, she liked the premise of New Year's, the promise of a clean slate, and another reason for her to shower her numerous friends with gifts. That was, before the Ladybug mantle and all the consequences that came with shouldering it that is. Now Marinette doesn't know what to feel about the whole affair. Slowly but surely the heroine finds herself dejected, empty and most of all alone, during New Year's save for those small moments which blare her cold heart to life, but even then they are short and easy to miss in the sea of anguish she seems to be struggling not to drown in. With all the burdens of heroism and responsibilities that even her civilian life bestow upon her, Marinette even finds it difficult to enjoy the little things in life. That is, until she doesn't.In other words, the classic 5 + 1 fanfic which humbly features the 5 times Marinette Dupain-Cheng spent her New Year's alone and the 1 time she didn't.

entry.summary:
Author: AKP31E

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 709Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Damian Wayne doesn’t always get to do what he wants. Sometimes he simply has to smile through the unpleasant things, and sometimes the things that start out unpleasant turn out to be the best things in the end. Meeting Marinette occurred during one of those unpleasant things, and he thinks that if he can convince her to stay by his side that all the other unpleasant things he has to do would be much better, and he wouldn’t have to work quite so hard to smile through.

entry.title: Tears Don't Rust the Blade
entry.summary:
Author: CherryCoke1818

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,144Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Une bougie - One candlePeut illuminer la nuit - Can illuminate the nightUn sourire - One smilePeut bâtir tout un empire - Can build an entire empireEt il y a toi - And there is youEt il y a moi - And there is meEt personne n'y croit - And no one believes itMais l'amour fait d'un fou un roi - But love makes a king out of a lunaticEt si tu m'ignores - And if you ignore meJ'me battrai encore et encore - I'd fight again and againIn a city with a sun that never shines, a boy tries to find a light-in himself, in others, regardless of the shadows in his heart. In the city of love, a girl loses all herself to a hatred she couldn't fight, a loathing that brought death in a place where the wicked found no mercy.Both betrayed by their own upbringings and childhoods that never were, they find one another. Two broken souls, bound by sorrow, striving to heal where no one believes healing is possible. Forever doomed by their own faults to remain in a tragedy, they try to run. Fate has control over them no more, breaking free from a life of ruin.The two, forever trapped in tragedy. Fighting forever to escape. An endless cycle. A miraculous end forevermore.

entry.title: Hear Me Out
entry.summary:
Author: ggomoz (ggomo_springtime)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,257Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 299

Summary: “Are you sure, Dames? Nobody odd coming to mind at all?” Dick switched the projector off, looking at Damian with curiosity.Unfortunately for Damian, an image flickered in his head, something he thought he had already forgotten since it was such a fleeting moment. He closed his eyes, turning away from his siblings. There was a gala, months ago, where a stranger had caught his eye: a woman from Paris who he later found out was a fashion designer now based in Gotham. His gut feeling told him that there was just a certain vibe, an aura he couldn’t quite explain that enveloped that woman.It didn’t help that they had locked eyes for a second; he swore that her eyes shouldn’t be able to glow that brightly.Damian felt fingers on the tip of his ear. “Warm ears? Red ears?” He could hear the smirk in Cass’ tone.And when he opened his eyes, the rest were just gawking at him.“Oh. My. Gosh.” Stephanie brought up a hand to her mouth. “Is it a celebrity crush?”***As far as Damian remembered, they were only gossiping about celebrities. How the hell did they end up unearthing something more?

entry.title: Space For You To Stay
entry.summary:
Author: ew_selfish_art

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,206Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 106

Summary: Damian Wayne isn't going through a bad break up. No one immediately close to him has died. And yet he's grieving, and trying desperately to escape his title. Robin. Something has shifted in his heart and Damian is desperate to learn how he can move forward without losing so much of himself.Marinette was told a year ago by Robin that he had figured out her identity, and she's felt weird about him ever since. But she's going to offer him a couch to crash on no matter how much he judges her small studio apartment. Who didn't want to live surrounded by fabric? Certainly not her.She offers the couch for a night, but they both know that this isn't a conclusion. It's a beginning.
